TopicTitle: KerbalStuff won't stay up for more than 5 minutes.......

Articles.Content: As I said, I cannot update Planet Factory Revived until this stupidity is resolved.
You should probably contact the creator of KerbalStuff, since, you know... KerbalStuff isn't an official part of the KSP Network.

You should probably contact the creator of KerbalStuff, since, you know... KerbalStuff isn't an official part of the KSP Network.

Those guys are never online.... It stops uploading right when it's about finished, and when I refresh I get a bad gateway error.
Don't they have accounts here and on Reddit? You could drop them a PM or an orangered

I just found my old Curse account, I'm making an alt download on Curse for now. Really annoying though because of how slow Curse is...

Edited December 28, 2014 by _Augustus_

Github is also a common and reliable place to host mods (and source code) as well.

That aside, shouting "this is broken, fix this" in a very gruff manner is not going to elicit the best responses.

Just check out the thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84154-Kerbal-Stuff-an-open-source-Space-Port-replacement/page60

Post something if its been down a while or you are having consistent issues.

As you can see from the thread its having intermittent issues, causing the site's software to need a manual nudge to get running again. Its being worked on.
